Statistics.Labour force: Increase |  184,610 (2019) | Increase |  59.8% employment rate (2017) | note: shortage of skilled labor and all types of technical personnel
Statistics.Main industries: Garment production, food processing, tourism, construction, oil

External.Export goods: Sugar, bananas, citrus, clothing, fish products, molasses, wood, crude oil
External.Main export partners: United Kingdom 30.8% | United States 18.7% | Nigeria 6.7% | Trinidad and Tobago 4.8% | Jamaica 4.2% | Bahamas 4.2% | (2015)
External.Import goods: Machinery and transport equipment, manufactured goods, fuels, chemicals, pharmaceuticals, food, beverages, tobacco
External.Main import partners: United States 26.6% | Mexico 11.7% | Cuba 10.2% | Guatemala 9% | China 7.5% | Trinidad and Tobago 5.6% | Indonesia 4.9% | (2015)
